Method Detail

startChat

public void startChat(javax.swing.JEditorPane doc,
                      javax.swing.JTextField field,
                      java.lang.String userName)
Start a chat session with the opponent. This method starts two threads: a ChatListener thread listens for incoming chat messages from the opponent, and a ChatSend thread which listens for user input and then sends that input to the opponents ChatListener thread.

Parameters:
doc - the text area that holds the chat output.
field - the text field that holds the user input to send.
userName - some name to identify the user.
